response.overview: How many metres of Super 8 do I need to go to (S8) at one frame per kilometre? A UN FPM This is a proposal for structural cinema that seeks to condense routes of different kinds, associating a metric value to travel. If we take into account that one second is 24 frames at normal speed, then one minute of filming will correspond to 1,440 ki-lometres.
response.title: A un FPM
